## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                              | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `spacing` | `spacing` | Spacing in pixels to apply in order to fit plot exactly. | `number` | `undefined` |
| `spec`    | `spec`    | The specification of the visualization.                  | `any`    | `undefined` |
